articles.title: Hockey, FIH Pro League: Savita Punia & Co look to bounce back as powerhouses Argentina come calling
articles.description: Argentina, who are yet lose in this Pro League season, not only have the advantage of current form but also the head-to-head against India in their favour.
articles.content: The last time the Indian senior women’s hockey team faced Argentina was in the semi-finals of the Tokyo Olympics. They lost by a 2-1 scoreline but won massive respect, not just of fans and followers of the sport in the country, but also their opponen... [5805 chars]

articles.title: Israel praises Argentina grounding plane with Iranian crew
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Israel praised Argentina on Thursday for holding a Venezuelan plane that included Iranian crew, saying the flight shows Tehran is trying to expand its influence in South America.
articles.content: A Venezuelan-owned Boeing 747 taxis on the runway after landing in the Ambrosio Taravella airport in Cordoba, Argentina, Monday, June 6, 2022. Argentine officials are trying to determine what to do with the cargo plane loaded with automotive parts an... [4678 chars]

articles.title: FACTBOX-Monkeypox cases around the world
articles.description: * The UNITED ARAB EMIRATES had reported a total of 13 infections since its first on May 24. AMERICAS * ARGENTINA had two confirmed cases as of June 2. * BRAZIL had confirmed three cases as of June 12, with its first on June 8.
articles.content:
More than 30 countries where monkeypox is not endemic have reported outbreaks of the viral disease as confirmed cases approach 1,900, most of them in Europe.
Monkeypox, which spreads through close contact and was first found in monkeys, mostly occurs... [3202 chars]

articles.title: Unbeaten Canada blasts Argentina U18 squad 89-55
articles.description: Canada dumps Argentina 89-55 to improve to 3-0 at women’s under-18 women’s basketball championship
articles.content:
Steve Baur likes what he sees so far, but the head coach of Canada’s under-18 women’s basketball team isn’t going to let a perfect pool record blur the big picture.
